channel.title: 1. Getting started on Open Search Log Analytics Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in 1. Getting started on Open Search Log Analytics Workshop

item.title: AWS Event
item.description: Only complete this section if you are at an AWS hosted event (such as re:Invent, Loft, Immersion Day, or any other event hosted by an AWS employee). If you are running the workshop on your own, go to Self Paced. Log into AWS Console via. AWS Workshop Portal Your instructor has already created an AWS account for you. Your instructor should provide you a participant hash. Once you have your participant hash go to https://dashboard.

item.title: Self Paced
item.description: Only complete this section if you are running the workshop on your own. If you are at an AWS hosted event (such as re:Invent, Loft, Immersion Day, or any other event hosted by an AWS employee), continue with AWS Event. Running the Workshop on Your Own You will need an AWS Account with web console access to complete the workshop. If you do not have an AWS account Create an AWS Account
